issue.title: Add a column to show us the number of time that this job is failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13936](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13936). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Try to use external repository to collect information about jobs name failling

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13936?focusedCommentId=17428889) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
There's some more content/requirements in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13060 which includes: 

At a minimum we should do the following:

- days since last passing
- last commit that passed
- % of failures in the past week, month, year
